page.title: 17DOVE HOLE'S BAND.
page.content: Dove Holes Band was formed in l877. During recent years the number of playing members has gradually dwindled from 26 to 12.For this reason the band have formed an alliance with Peak Dale Band who were in a similar position. The new name,Dove Holes Alliance Band, is only for registration with the Brass Band Association to enable the combined bands to enter contests. The administration of each band is still kept separate.Both bands still exist in their own right.They practice twice each week. The instruments are all brass.Out of approx.25 engagements each year about 8 involve marching. Alton Towers,Chatsworth Park,Godley Whit Walks & Buxton Pavilion Gardens are among places at which they per- form.The ratio of men to women is 3:1.
